remark.ch: 實習課時間是星期四晚上6:00~8:00，地點在I1-307教室。不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。

goal.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the basic knowledge of Managerial Accounting. After taking this course, students will know: (1) The basic terms of cost concepts. (2) How to manage costs. (3) How to conduct cost analysis and profit planning. (4) How to analyze accounting information for various decision making.

content.en:
Week Topic
1 ( 2/20 ) Introduction
2 ( 2/27) No class
3 ( 3/05) Ch.2 Basic Cost Management Concepts
4 ( 3/12) Ch.3 Product Costing and Cost Accumulation
5 ( 3/19 ) Ch.4 Process Costing and Hybrid Product-Costing Systems
6 ( 3/26 ) Ch.5 Activity-Based Costing and Management
7 ( 4/02 ) Beginning term exam
8 ( 4/09 ) Ch.6 Activity Analysis, Cost Behavior, and Cost Estimation
9 ( 4/16 ) Ch.7 Cost-Volume-Profit Analysis
10 (4/23 ) Ch.8 Variable Costing and the measurement of quality cost
11 ( 4/30 ) Ch.9 Financial Planning and Analysis: The Master Budget
12 ( 5/07 ) Mid-term exam
13 ( 5/14 ) Ch.10 Standard Costing and Analysis of Direct Costs
14 ( 5/21) Ch.11 Flexible Budgeting and Analysis of Overhead Costs
15 ( 5/28 )Ch.12 Responsibility Accounting and BSC ＆ Ch.13 Investment Centers and Transfer Pricing
16 ( 06/04 ) Ch.14 Decision Making: Relevant Costs and Benefits
17 (06/11) Final Exam
